email_text:
Subject: Your Verizon Monthly Bill Notification

Dear [Customer Name],

Thank you for being a valued Verizon customer. This email is to notify you that your monthly bill for the period of [Bill Cycle Dates] is now available for viewing and payment.

Summary of Your Bill:
- Account Number: [Account Number]
- Amount Due: $[Total Amount Due]
- Due Date: [Due Date]

To view and download your detailed monthly bill statement, please click on the following link: [PDF Download Link]

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your bill, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service team at [Customer Service Phone Number]. We are here to assist you in any way we can.

Thank you for choosing Verizon as your service provider. We appreciate your business.

Sincerely,
Verizon Customer Service Team
